Reviews.Title: yes yes yes
Reviews.Author: MS. Jennifer
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent purchase I made.Would ike to give a five star ratings.  The delvery was on time the computer was so clean and work so good.  I would like to say excellent excellent and excellent again

Reviews.Title: Execellent
Reviews.Author: chan
Reviews.Content: Thank u sooo much Wegner,the product was and is still doing great!The battery life is good plus the macbook came in great shape,Im recommending anyone who is interested in purchasing a Mac to get thru Wegner Media thanx again and Amazon thanx!

Reviews.Title: my mac
Reviews.Author: faonna
Reviews.Content: im on this laptop right now i love it...shes my baby. i tricked her out with pink. she works great an came in fantastic condition thank u so much.

Reviews.Title: My fiest Apple
Reviews.Author: LitaCampbell
Reviews.Content: I just love this computer. After getting to know my way around an Apple I would recommend an Apple to anyone. I know they can be pricey but they are well worth it. The one I bought has some years on it but works like a champ. I have no problems and it is fast. I personal like mine better than the newer one because it is all white. That is something I was wanting and had to get an older modle in order to do so. Again, love my first Apple and highly recommend one to anyone.
